attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we respectfully request the same rights as MP's who for their own gain fail to pay tax on expenses for items that can be regarded as unnessaccery for political life.  We also request that should MP's gain the right to be paid for turning up to the House as is their job, that we the population be awarded the same amounts against our taxes for going to work.

We would like to point out to the PM that we consider this tax evation by the MP's against the against the human rights of the population of the UK as all people should be treated equally, therefor we request the same rights as MP's

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
